scenario_text.value: Huh?! What are you guys doing here?

Really? You’re not just saying that so you
can hand Her Majesty over to the bad guys?
No way! We wouldn’t do that!

So if you know where Miu’s hiding, could you
tell us?
No, I’m not supposed to say, so I won’t!

What?! But what if the bad guys take her away
before we can find her?!

Nobody would ever think to look in a <color=#B41919>place
like that</color>!

(Sounds like she’s hiding in some unexpected
location.)

Nobody would ever think to look for Her
Majesty in there!
